fortune: Do not let ambitions overshadow small success.
quote: Real change, enduring change, happens one step at a time.

fortune: When someone tells me ‘no,’ it doesn’t mean I can’t do it, it simply means I can’t do it with them
quote: Do not underestimate yourself. Human beings have unlimited potentials.

fortune: Your talents will be recognized and suitably rewarded.
quote: Do not let anyone ever tell you who you are.

fortune: If you continually give, you will continually have.
quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.

fortune: It’s not the amount of time you devote, but what you devote to the time that counts.
quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

fortune: You will travel far and wide, both pleasure and business.
quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
